channel.title: Comments on: Rav Yitzchak Abadi in Teaneck
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2010/08/25/rav-yitzchak-abadi-in-teaneck/#comment-1517">MB</a>.
MB, I know. He also wanted to talk kli al gabi Kli but his listeners came in with different opinions and did not expect his answer.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to MB.

MB, I know. He also wanted to talk kli al gabi Kli but his listeners came in with different opinions and did not expect his answer.

item.title: By: MB
item.dc:creator: MB
item.description: He holds that if you put some tinfoil on the warming tray, you can return the food the it.
item.content:encoded: He holds that if you put some tinfoil on the warming tray, you can return the food the it.
